text.p: Three Months Ended Twelve Months Ended
NOTE: (1) Includes a non-recurring compensation charge of $1.5 million. Excluding this charge Pro forma net income and Pro forma net income per share were $3.8 million and $0.58 respectively.
(2) Reflects the termination of the Company's "S" corporation status as of December 31, 1996, related to the initial public offering.

(3) Based on historical income as adjusted to reflect reduced interest expense related to the paydown of debt upon receipt of proceeds from the public offering and a provision for income tax as if the Company had always been a "C" corporation, which excludes the non-recurring, non-cash deferred tax provision of $ 2.4 million.
(4) Based on the weighted average shares outstanding after the public offering as of January 1997.
